dmca.title: www.fsmse.com copyright and theft
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ruthmeri Gleason - MSE Proposal Manager/Coordinator
[mailto:ruthmeri.gleason@mse-ta.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2006 11:03 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: www.fsmse.com copyright and theft 


Notice for Claims of Intellectual Property Violations and Agent for Notice

According to the information listed on
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html I would like to report

1. A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that
you claim has been infringed; My company's hosts a web site at
www.mse-ta.com. Recently, I found out that the format and information on our
site was being illegally used by someone who set up a site at www.fsmse.com.
These people are taking MSE's text and photos (both copyrighted on the MSE
site) verbatim and reproducing it on the false web site to lure people into
buying advertising on the fsmse site.
They are impugning MSE's good name, lying to the people paying for
advertisements, and misrepresenting themselves as MSE.

2. A description of the location where the material that you claim is
infringing is located; Location of true material is at
         www.mse-ta.com

Location of false material is
         http://www.fsmse.com\ - (and all pages linked via the bottom
navigation
bar)
        http://www.fsmse.com/company/companyoverview.htm
        http://www.fsmse.com/aerospaceen/aerospaceenhome.htm
        http://www.fsmse.com/defense/defensehome.htm
        http://www.fsmse.com/defense/fms.htm
...
and all subsequent pages on fsmse.com


3. A statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the reported
use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, its
agent, or the law; I, Ruthmeri Gleason,  MSE Technology Applications Inc.
Proposal Manager/Web Master, state that the people responsible for
information at www.fsmse.com are not authorized by any MSE employee or agent
to use the material they post on fsmse.com. Additionally, they are using
copyrighted material about MSE and misrepresenting MSE and potentially
diverting business opportunities from MSE.

4. Your address, telephone number, and, if available, e-mail address;
Ruthmeri Gleason Proposal Manager/Coordinator MSE Technology Applications
Inc.
200 Technology Way
Butte, MT 59701
406.494.7354  www.mse-ta.com

5.A statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above
information is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual
property owner or authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual
property owner's behalf; and I, Ruthmeri Gleason,  MSE Technology
Applications Inc. Proposal Manager/Web Master, state that the above
information is accurate and I am authorized to act on behalf of MSE
Technology Applications Inc., copyright owner of the information.

6. An electronic or physical signature by the person making the submission
(i.e., you or such other person authorized to act on behalf of the
complaining party).  If the submission is made electronically, the
authorized person making the submission should designate his or her
electronic signature by typing a forward slash ("/") before and after his or
her typed name and follow this electronic signature by again typing his or
her name.  For example:

/Ruthmeri Gleason/
Ruthmeri Gleason

Thank you for your time.



Original Message Follows:
-------------------------

Hello. I would like to report that someone is stealing my company's web site
www.mse-ta.com and using it to get money for placing ads by Yahoo.
Someone
has taken our site verbatim and renamed it www.fsmse.com and are letting
people put up your yahoo adds. Please let me know how we can work together
to stop this out right stealing and maintain the integrity of Yahoo and MSE.

Thank you .
_______________________

Ruthmeri (Mary) Gleason  | Proposal Manager/Coordinator | MSE Technology
Applications Inc. |
| 406.494.7354 | www.mse-ta.com | www.tetragenics.com |
